wellio_installed: Wellio is installed on your device. Open it from your home screen or app drawer.
install_description: Install Wellio on your device for a native app experience with offline access
works_offline_desc: Access your data even without internet
faster_performance_desc: Loads instantly from your home screen
ios_step_1: 1. Tap the Share button (square with arrow) in Safari
ios_step_2: 2. Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
ios_step_3: 3. Tap "Add" in the top right corner
android_step_1: 1. Tap the menu (three dots) in your browser
android_step_2: 2. Select "Install app" or "Add to Home Screen"
android_step_3: 3. Follow the prompts to complete installation
enhance_experience: Enhance your Wellio experience with these powerful features
offline_sync_later: You're offline - changes will sync when back online
install_for_offline: Install Wellio on your device for offline access and a native app experience
notifications_description: Get reminders for workouts, meal logging, and social interactions
performance_description: Wellio uses advanced optimization techniques for blazing fast performance
image_lazy_loading_desc: Images load only when needed to save bandwidth
intelligent_caching_desc: Your data is cached for instant access
code_splitting_desc: Pages load on demand for faster initial load
keyboard_shortcuts_desc: Navigate faster with these keyboard shortcuts (Alt + Key)
